statements: SELECT * FROM StudentProgressReports WHERE student_id = 1;
SELECT student_name, class_grade FROM StudentProgressReports WHERE class_grade > 80;
SELECT subject, teacher_name FROM StudentProgressReports WHERE subject = 'Mathematics';
SELECT progress_report FROM StudentProgressReports WHERE student_name = 'Alice';
SELECT * FROM StudentProgressReports ORDER BY class_grade DESC, student_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM StudentProgressReports WHERE class_grade > 80 ORDER BY student_name ASC;
SELECT student_id, student_name, class_grade, teacher_name FROM StudentProgressReports WHERE subject = 'Math' ORDER BY class_grade DESC;
SELECT student_name, class_grade, teacher_name FROM StudentProgressReports WHERE class_grade < 60 AND subject = 'Science';
SELECT student_id, student_name, subject FROM StudentProgressReports WHERE teacher_name LIKE '%Smith%' ORDER BY student_id;
SELECT * FROM StudentProgressReports WHERE subject = 'History' AND progress_report IS NOT NULL ORDER BY student_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM StudentProgressReports;
SELECT student_name, grade FROM StudentProgressReports WHERE grade = 'A';
SELECT student_name, course_name FROM StudentProgressReports ORDER BY student_name DESC;
SELECT student_id, course_name FROM StudentProgressReports WHERE student_id = 101;
SELECT * FROM ParentAccess JOIN StudentProgressReports ON ParentAccess.student_id = StudentProgressReports.student_id;
SELECT student_name, course_name, grade FROM StudentProgressReports WHERE student_id = 1;
SELECT course_name, student_name, grade FROM StudentProgressReports WHERE grade = 'A';
SELECT * FROM StudentProgressReports WHERE grade IN ('A', 'B');
SELECT parent_name, student_name, course_name, grade FROM ParentAccess JOIN StudentProgressReports ON ParentAccess.student_id = StudentProgressReports.student_id;
SELECT student_name, course_name, grade FROM StudentProgressReports ORDER BY grade DESC, course_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM Students;
SELECT student_id, student_name FROM Students WHERE grade_level > 10;
SELECT student_name, grade FROM Students WHERE student_id = 100;
SELECT course_name, teacher FROM Courses WHERE teacher = 'John Smith';
SELECT student_name, course_name, grade, report_date FROM Students JOIN ProgressReports ON Students.student_id = ProgressReports.student_id;
SELECT student_id, student_name, grade_level FROM Students;
SELECT * FROM Courses WHERE teacher = 'John Doe';
SELECT student_id, course_id, grade, report_date FROM ProgressReports WHERE grade >= 80;
SELECT course_name, teacher, student_name FROM Courses JOIN Students ON Courses.course_id = Courses.course_id;
SELECT student_id, student_name, grade, report_date FROM Students JOIN ProgressReports ON Students.student_id = ProgressReports.student_id WHERE course_id = 101;
SELECT * FROM progress_reports;
SELECT student_id, progress, grade FROM progress_reports WHERE course_id = 101;
SELECT first_name, last_name, age FROM students ORDER BY age DESC;
SELECT course_name, instructor, start_date, end_date FROM courses WHERE start_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT parent_name, parent_email, phone_number FROM parents WHERE phone_number LIKE '%555%';
SELECT * FROM progress_reports WHERE student_id = 1;
SELECT course_name, instructor FROM courses WHERE start_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT first_name, last_name, age, parent_email FROM students WHERE age BETWEEN 10 AND 15;
SELECT parent_name, phone_number FROM parents WHERE parent_email LIKE '%gmail.com%';
SELECT student_id, course_id, progress, grade FROM progress_reports ORDER BY progress DESC, grade ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM Student;
SELECT first_name, last_name, age FROM Student ORDER BY age DESC;
SELECT course_name, credit_hours FROM Course WHERE credit_hours > 3;
SELECT student_id, course_id, enrollment_date FROM Enrollment WHERE enrollment_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT first_name, last_name, email FROM Parent WHERE email LIKE '%gmail.com%';
SELECT * FROM Student ORDER BY student_id DESC;
SELECT first_name, last_name, age FROM Student WHERE age > 20 ORDER BY age ASC;
SELECT Course.course_name, Enrollment.enrollment_date FROM Course JOIN Enrollment ON Course.course_id = Enrollment.course_id;
SELECT Student.first_name, Course.course_name, Report.grade FROM Student JOIN Report ON Student.student_id = Report.student_id JOIN Course ON Report.course_id = Course.course_id;
SELECT Parent.first_name AS parent_first_name, Student.first_name AS student_first_name, Student.last_name AS student_last_name FROM Parent JOIN Student ON Parent.parent_id = Student.student_id;
